inclusion.criterion: Be capable of giving informed consent.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Have a pathology proven diagnosis of any of newly diagnosed Glioblastoma Multiforme
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Have completed the first part of standard of care chemo-radiation (Stupp), for 6 weeks, and not started the maintenance phase of temozolomide
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Agree to use effective barrier contraception while on treatment and for 2 months thereafter, if of childbearing potential
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Be between the ages of 18 to 74
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Have a performance status KPS 70 or greater
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Be able to swallow pills and capsules
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Be able to tolerate oral chemotherapeutic medications, with no health threatening allergies or side effects, based on lab and clinical findings
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Have adequate bone marrow function, liver function and renal function before commencing therapy
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Prior chemotherapy with capecitabine or temozolomide for other prior malignancies.
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Patients previously treated with continuous infusion 5-FU or any schedule of DTIC, which are similar to capecitabine and temozolomide, respectively, will be excluded.
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Prior chemotherapies for newly diagnosed GBM or AA, other than temozolomide during radiation.
exclusion.label: triggers
